subTitle: I craft digital experiences.
extraInfo:
For years, I’ve been building scalable, high-performance web applications that not only function seamlessly but also push boundaries. As a Software Engineer, I thrive in dynamic environments where problem-solving and innovation take center stage. My expertise lies in React, Node.js, AWS, Docker, and microservices, and I’m always on the lookout for the next big challenge.

Lately, I’ve been diving deep into Large Language Models (LLMs) and AI-driven applications. Exploring how LLMs can transform software development, automate processes, and enhance user experiences is something I’m incredibly passionate about. Whether it’s integrating AI into applications or fine-tuning models for specific use cases, I’m always eager to experiment and push the limits of what’s possible. Let’s connect and create something awesome together!
